name: University of Manila
description: A premier university offering a wide range of undergraduate and graduate programs with a focus on research and innovation.

programDetails.name: Computer Science
programDetails.description: Learn programming, algorithms, and software development.

programDetails.name: Business Administration
programDetails.description: Study management, marketing, and entrepreneurship.

programDetails.name: Medicine
programDetails.description: Comprehensive medical education with clinical rotations.

programDetails.name: Civil Engineering
programDetails.description: Design and build infrastructure and public works.

admissionProcess: Submit application form, entrance exam, interview, and required documents. Applications are accepted from June to August each year.
tuitionDetails: Tuition ranges from ₱50,000 to ₱80,000 per semester depending on the program. Scholarships and financial aid are available.

reviews.text: Excellent university with great professors and modern facilities. The campus is beautiful and the community is very supportive.
Good academic programs but the registration process can be improved. Overall, I had a positive experience during my time here.

name: Quezon City College
description: A community college providing affordable education with a focus on practical skills and workforce readiness.

programDetails.name: Information Technology
programDetails.description: Practical IT skills for the modern workplace.

programDetails.name: Hotel and Restaurant Management
programDetails.description: Training for careers in hospitality and tourism.

admissionProcess: Submit application form, high school transcript, and attend orientation. Next admission cycle opens in November.
tuitionDetails: Tuition is approximately ₱25,000 per semester. City residents receive discounts.

reviews.text: Affordable education with decent quality. The IT program is particularly good with updated curriculum.

name: Makati Science High School
description: A specialized science high school offering STEM-focused education for academically gifted students.

programDetails.name: STEM Strand
programDetails.description: Rigorous curriculum in Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics.

programDetails.name: Research Program
programDetails.description: Specialized track for students interested in scientific research.

admissionProcess: Entrance examination, interview, and review of junior high school records. Only top-performing students are admitted.
tuitionDetails: Public school with minimal fees. Scholarships available for exceptional students.

reviews.text: Excellent science program with dedicated teachers. The research opportunities are outstanding for high school level.
Challenging curriculum that prepares students well for college. The workload is heavy but worth it.

name: Central Luzon State University
description: A leading agricultural university known for its research and extension programs in agriculture, forestry, and fisheries.

programDetails.name: Agricultural Engineering
programDetails.description: Application of engineering principles to agricultural production and processing.

programDetails.name: Veterinary Medicine
programDetails.description: Comprehensive program for animal health and medicine.

programDetails.name: Agriculture
programDetails.description: Study of crop production, animal husbandry, and agricultural economics.

admissionProcess: Submit application form, entrance examination, and interview. Special consideration for agriculture-related achievements.
tuitionDetails: State university with subsidized tuition. Free tuition for qualified students under the Universal Access to Quality Tertiary Education Act.

reviews.text: Great university for agricultural studies. The hands-on experience with the research farms is invaluable.

name: St. Paul College Pasig
description: A Catholic educational institution offering quality education with a focus on Christian values and character formation.

programDetails.name: Regular Academic Program
programDetails.description: Comprehensive curriculum following the K-12 program.

programDetails.name: Special Science Class
programDetails.description: Advanced science and mathematics for gifted students.

admissionProcess: Entrance examination, interview with parents, and submission of report cards from previous school.
tuitionDetails: Annual tuition ranges from ₱90,000 to ₱120,000 depending on the grade level. Additional fees for special programs.

reviews.text: Excellent education with a good balance of academics, values formation, and extracurricular activities.
Strong academic program and good facilities. The teachers are dedicated and supportive.

name: Ateneo de Manila University
description: A prestigious Jesuit university known for its liberal arts tradition and formation of leaders for the nation.

programDetails.name: Management
programDetails.description: Comprehensive business education with a focus on ethics and leadership.

programDetails.name: Communications
programDetails.description: Study of media, journalism, and organizational communication.

programDetails.name: Psychology
programDetails.description: Understanding human behavior and mental processes.

admissionProcess: Submit application, entrance exam (ACET), and interview. Highly competitive admission process.
tuitionDetails: Annual tuition ranges from ₱200,000 to ₱250,000 depending on the program. Financial aid and scholarships available.

reviews.text: World-class education with excellent faculty. The Jesuit tradition of education is evident in the holistic formation.
Amazing university with a beautiful campus. The core curriculum really helps develop critical thinking.

name: Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology
description: A highly regarded university in Ghana, known for its strong focus on science and technology, and is considered a top research institution in Africa, with global quality accreditation

programDetails.name: Computer Science
programDetails.description: Application of Science and Mathematics in mordern computing. Software Development and many more

programDetails.name: Veterinary Medicine
programDetails.description: Comprehensive program for animal health and medicine.

programDetails.name: Agriculture
programDetails.description: Study of crop production, animal husbandry, and agricultural economics.

admissionProcess: Submit application form, entrance examination, and interview. Special consideration for agriculture-related achievements.
tuitionDetails: State university with subsidized tuition. Free tuition for qualified students under the Universal Access to Quality Tertiary Education Act.

reviews.text: Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology stands out as one of the best institutions for higher education in Africa. The university offers a wide range of well-structured academic programs that equip students with both theoretical knowledge and practical skills.

name: University of Ghana
description: As the leading university in Ghana, the University aims to produce the next generation of thought leaders to drive national development

programDetails.name: Computer Science
programDetails.description: Application of Science and Mathematics in mordern computing. Software Development and many more

programDetails.name: Veterinary Medicine
programDetails.description: Comprehensive program for animal health and medicine.

programDetails.name: Pharmacy
programDetails.description: Study in a healthcare field where medications and other healthcare products are dispensed

admissionProcess: Submit application form, entrance examination, and interview. Special consideration for agriculture-related achievements.
tuitionDetails: State university with subsidized tuition. Free tuition for qualified students under the Universal Access to Quality Tertiary Education Act.

reviews.text: I recently completed the Introduction to Pharmacy course, and I must say it was an incredible learning experience

name: University of Cape Coast
description: The University of Cape Coast was established in October, 1962 as a University College and placed in a special relationship with the University of Ghana, Legon. On October 1, 1971, the College attained the status of a full and independent University, with the authority to confer its own degrees, diplomas and certificates by an Act of Parliament - The University of Cape Coast Act, 1971 [Act 390] and subsequently the University of Cape Coast Law, 1992 [PNDC Law 278].

programDetails.name: Information Technology
programDetails.description: Application of Science and Mathematics in mordern computing. Software Development and many more

programDetails.name: Veterinary Medicine
programDetails.description: Comprehensive program for animal health and medicine.

programDetails.name: Pharmacy
programDetails.description: Study in a healthcare field where medications and other healthcare products are dispensed

admissionProcess: Submit application form, entrance examination, and interview. Special consideration for agriculture-related achievements.
tuitionDetails: State university with subsidized tuition. Free tuition for qualified students under the Universal Access to Quality Tertiary Education Act.

reviews.text: As a UCC student, I appreciated how the courses were tailored to our local context. The intructors uesd examples and case studies from African settings, making the course highly relevant and engaging
